name: Nano Banana AI Product Image Creator via WhatsApp
description:
# Nano Banana AI Product Image Creator via WhatsApp

Transform ordinary product photos into premium marketing visuals instantly using Gemini AI for prompt enhancement and Nano Banana AI for image generation through WhatsApp.

## Who's it for
- Small business owners
- E-commerce sellers
- Social media managers
- Anyone selling products online

## What it does
‚Ä¢ Takes your normal product photo
‚Ä¢ Gets your text/caption as input
‚Ä¢ Gemini AI improves your basic prompt into professional instructions
‚Ä¢ Nano Banana AI generates new premium ad image using enhanced prompt
‚Ä¢ Keeps your original product exactly the same
‚Ä¢ Returns social media-ready marketing image

## Key Benefits
**Smart Prompt Enhancement** - Gemini AI makes your simple text into professional prompts  
**Superior Image Generation** - Nano Banana AI creates premium visuals
**Original Product Protected** - Your product stays 100% unchanged  
**Fast Results** - Get enhanced image in under 60 seconds  
**Easy to Use** - Just send photo via WhatsApp  
**Social Media Ready** - Perfect for Instagram, Facebook, ads  

## How it works
1. **Send Photo + Caption** ‚Üí Upload product image with your text
2. **AI Prompt Magic** ‚Üí Gemini AI turns your caption into professional prompt
3. **Image Generation** ‚Üí Nano Banana AI creates new premium ad using improved prompt
4. **Receive Result** ‚Üí Get marketing-ready image back instantly

## The Magic Process
**Your Input:** "Make this look premium for Instagram"  
**Gemini AI Enhanced Prompt:** "Create luxury product advertisement with professional studio lighting, marble background, elegant typography, commercial photography style, high-end visual appeal..."  
**Nano Banana AI Generated Result:** Professional marketing image created with your improved prompt

## What you get
‚Ä¢ **Better Prompts** - Gemini AI turns simple text into detailed instructions
‚Ä¢ **Professional Images** - Studio-quality marketing visuals generated by Nano Banana AI
‚Ä¢ **Same Product** - Your original item stays unchanged
‚Ä¢ **Quick Results** - Ready in under 60 seconds

## Perfect for
- Instagram posts
- Facebook ads  
- Online store images
- Social media marketing

## Why This Combo Works Best
- **Gemini AI** - Expert at understanding and enhancing text prompts
- **Nano Banana AI** - Specialized for high-quality product image generation
- **Best of Both** - Combines prompt expertise with image generation power
- **Faster Results** - Optimized dual-AI workflow

Perfect solution for creating professional product ads from simple WhatsApp messages using the power of both Gemini AI and Nano Banana AI.

parameters.content:
# Nano Banana AI Product Image Creator via WhatsApp

## üöÄ Node 1: WhatsApp Message Received
**Type:** WhatsApp Trigger
- **Updates:** Check "messages" only
- **Credentials:** Add your WhatsApp Business API credentials
- **Purpose:** Listens for incoming WhatsApp messages with images

---

## üì± Node 2: Get Media URL
**Type:** WhatsApp
- **Resource:** Media
- **Operation:** Media URL Get
- **Media ID:** `{{ $('WhatsApp Message Received').item.json.messages[0].image.id }}`
- **Purpose:** Gets the download URL for the image sent by user

---

## ‚¨áÔ∏è Node 3: Download Image File
**Type:** HTTP Request
- **Method:** GET
- **URL:** `{{ $json.url }}`
- **Headers:** 
  - Name: `Authorization`
  - Value: `Bearer YOUR_ACCESS_TOKEN`
- **Response Format:** File
- **Purpose:** Downloads the actual image file from WhatsApp servers

---

## üîÑ Node 4: Image to Base64
**Type:** Extract From File
- **Operation:** Binary to Property
- **Purpose:** Converts downloaded image to base64 format for AI processing

---

## ü§ñ Node 5: AI Design Analysis
**Type:** Google Gemini
- **Resource:** Image
- **Operation:** Analyze
- **Model:** `nano banana` or `gemini-2.5-flash-preview-05-20`
- **Input Type:** Binary
- **Text Prompt:** (Already configured - analyzes image for design improvements)
- **Purpose:** AI analyzes the image and suggests design enhancements

---

## üîó Node 6: Combine Image & Analysis
**Type:** Merge
- **Settings:** Default merge settings
- **Purpose:** Combines the base64 image data with AI analysis results

---

## ‚öôÔ∏è Node 7: Prepare API Payload
**Type:** Code (JavaScript)
- **Code:** (Already configured)
- **Purpose:** Formats data for Google Gemini image generation API

---

## üé® Node 8: Generate Enhanced Image
**Type:** HTTP Request
- **Method:** POST
- **URL:** `https://generativelanguage.googleapis.com/v1beta/models/gemini-2.5-flash-image-preview:generateContent`
- **Authentication:** Use Google Palm API credentials
- **Body:** JSON (already configured)
- **Purpose:** Generates enhanced image using AI

---

## üñºÔ∏è Node 9: Convert Base64 to Image
**Type:** Convert to File
- **Operation:** To Binary
- **Source Property:** `candidates[0].content.parts[0].inlineData.data`
- **Purpose:** Converts AI-generated base64 back to image file

---

## üì§ Node 10: Send Image
**Type:** WhatsApp
- **Operation:** Send
- **Phone Number ID:** Your WhatsApp Business phone number ID
- **Recipient:** `+{{ $('WhatsApp Message Received').first().json.contacts[0].wa_id }}`
- **Message Type:** Image
- **Media Path:** Use Media in n8n
- **Purpose:** Sends the enhanced image back to the user

---

## üîë Required Credentials:
1. **WhatsApp Business API** - For receiving/sending messages
2. **Google Palm/Gemini API** - For AI image analysis and generation

## üìù Setup Notes:
- Replace `YOUR_ACCESS_TOKEN` with your actual WhatsApp access token
- Ensure all credentials are properly configured
- Test with a simple image first
- Monitor for API rate limits

## ‚ö†Ô∏è Important:
- This workflow only triggers when users send images
- Make sure your WhatsApp Business account has proper permissions
- Keep your API tokens secure and rotate them regularly

parameters.text:
=You are a master creative director specializing in viral product advertisements. Transform the uploaded product image and caption {{ $('WhatsApp Message Received').item.json.messages[0].image.caption }} into a stunning commercial-grade advertisement that stops scrollers and drives sales.

CORE RULES:
- Keep the original product 100% unchanged - no alterations, replacements, or distortions
- Use only user-provided text from the caption
- Focus on premium visual enhancement and commercial appeal

OUTPUT FORMAT - Return strictly as JSON:

{
  "headline": "Use only user-provided text or leave empty",
  "subheadline": "Use only user-provided text or leave empty", 
  "description": "Use only user-provided text or leave empty",
  "call_to_action": "Use only user-provided text or leave empty",
  "design_suggestions": "Create a detailed commercial photography concept:

HERO SHOT COMPOSITION: Position the product as the absolute star using professional product photography techniques. Apply rule of thirds, golden ratio, and negative space for maximum visual impact. Create depth layers with foreground, middle ground, and background elements.

PREMIUM LIGHTING SETUP: Design studio-quality lighting with key light at 45-degree angle, fill light to reduce shadows, rim light for edge definition, and background light for separation. Add subtle color temperature variations - warm highlights (3200K) and cool shadows (5600K) for dimension.

LUXURY BACKGROUND: Choose from these premium options:
- Minimalist: Clean white/gray gradient with subtle texture
- Marble: Polished Carrara marble surface with natural veining  
- Fabric: Flowing silk or velvet draping in complementary colors
- Industrial: Brushed metal, concrete, or glass surfaces
- Natural: Stone, wood grain, or organic textures

CINEMATIC COLOR GRADING: Apply professional color correction with:
- Primary colors: Enhance product's natural colors by 15-20%
- Secondary colors: Desaturate background by 10-15% to make product pop
- Shadows: Add subtle blue/teal tint (-5 temperature)
- Highlights: Warm golden tone (+10 temperature)
- Overall: Increase contrast by 20%, add film grain for premium feel

VISUAL EFFECTS & POLISH: Add sophisticated finishing touches:
- Soft focus background (f/2.8 depth of field effect)  
- Subtle product reflections on surface
- Elegant shadow casting with 70% opacity
- Gentle rim lighting glow around product edges
- Optional: Floating particles or light rays for magic

ADVERTISEMENT STYLE: Make it look like a premium brand campaign - think Apple product launches, luxury fashion ads, or high-end cosmetic commercials. The final image should be Instagram-worthy, Pinterest-perfect, and conversion-focused.

TECHNICAL SPECS: 16:9 aspect ratio, high resolution, sharp product focus, cinematic lighting, commercial photography style, premium brand aesthetic.

Describe every visual element in detail (400+ words) to create a show-stopping advertisement that makes people want to buy immediately."
}

user.name: Roshan Ramani
user.bio:
I love building smart n8n automations that actually work reliably.

 My focus is on making everyday tasks like email, social media, and CRM workflows simpler using AI.

I've shared templates in the n8n community, including a WhatsApp Expense Tracker that people really enjoy.
What keeps me excited is constantly trying new things - testing fresh nodes, playing with AI tools like LangChain, and discovering creative ways to connect systems!
